name: On Thin Ice (Rainsong)
description:
For Trijam #110 -- "Give up before it's too late"

Solo project completed in under three hours (with fifteen minutes to spare!), including the music and all art assets.

Collect gems and get back inside the door before the ice breaks. The darker ice areas are gradually melting, turning to slush and water, where you'll fall through. There are no save/check-points.

Use A and D or left-arrow and right-arrow to move left and right. Use Up-arrow, W or space-key to jump.

Software:
Game engine: ct.js
Art: Affinity Designer
Music: beepbox.co
